underlying_goal: To standardize the methodology for calculating and reporting confidence intervals (CIs) across all project documentation and agent instructions.
primary_success: Creating a single source of truth (`ci-standards.md`) and then systematically updating numerous other files (agents, checklists) to reference it, ensuring consistency and maintainability.
brief_summary: The user asked about statistical reporting standards. Claude found mentions of CIs but confirmed there was no standardized methodology. The user provided a detailed standard, and after discussion, Claude created a canonical `ci-standards.md` document and refactored multiple agent files and checklists to reference this single source of truth, ensuring the new standard was applied consistently.
